interaction.title: Layout composition
interaction.content: Choose tools, viewer options, layers groups, priorities and interactions.

interaction.title: Perform map algebra
interaction.content: Run simulations from selected input maps.

interaction.title: Inspect hover
interaction.content: Get any cell value or a region's total value in real-time.

interaction.title: Display specific values ranges
interaction.content: Dynamically limit the range of map values.

interaction.title: Show sankey diagrams
interaction.content: Select a transition between two maps and show that specific transition on the map.

database.title: CSR DATABASE
database.content: All maps publicly available; all maps include comprehensive metadata.

database.title: REMOTE WMS SERVERS
database.content: Easily configure a server to display your maps on CSR Maps or on a GIS software.

database.title: DISPLAY YOUR MAPS
database.content: Access your maps or tables from file storage services such as GitHub, Bitbucket and many others.

share.title: Step 1) PUBLISH YOUR MAPS
share.content: Publish your interactive maps online. With few clicks proccess your map to display online and send it to a file storage such as GitHub or BitBucket.

share.title: Step 2) CREATE YOUR LAYOUTS
share.content: Create your maps presentation and interactions. Create your platform layout by choosing maps, elements, tools and interactions.

share.title: Step 3) SHARE YOUR PLATFORM
share.content: Make your data accessible to all persons. Share your research your data online with millions of users.

license.title: FREE OF CHARGE
license.content: Completely free for any commercial use except the highcharts library. This library has a limitation in highchart license, please contact them directly.

license.title: EDUCATIONAL
license.content: Completely free for any educational purpose.

license.title: FEATURED EXAMPLES
license.content: Multiple usage examples for each element.
